If after trouble shooting, the AC it still doesn’t work, use the online appointment scheduling tool at https://t.co/09H0exsPAw.  Thanks for your patience.
Is the AC is not cooling enough? Check your outside unit (or condenser). Remove any debris or leaves around the unit as they may be blocking air intake.
Is the AC not turning on? Check the circuit breaker in the house to make sure the breaker is on and operational.
Is there water on the floor near the unit?  Try to disconnect the condensate line and blow water or air through it. Clogged or blocked condenser lines are sometimes the culprit.

If you’re calling for service to your air conditioner, here are a few trouble shooting tips you can try. Have you checked to make sure the air filter at the furnace is clean? A dirty or clogged filter can affect the air conditioners performance.
